QuestData.Title: No Wings Required
QuestData.Description:
That thing looks like it's got the range to get us over the wall. There's a good spot to hook onto right past us - you should be able to spot it from here.
Once you're inside, do me a favor and see if you can distract the guards so I can slip through. I'll see what else I can find out about these vrykul.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Stormforged Grapple Launcher to launch over the wall at Hrydshal.
